Faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
Faq.q1: How does the AI Overwatcher work?
Faq.a1: We send a daily greeting. If the user doesn't respond, our AI assistant calls to check if everything is okay. We only notify relatives if the AI cannot establish contact or identifies a need.
Faq.a2: We offer different levels of active care. More information about pricing and features will be available at launch.
Faq.q3: Is it difficult to talk to an AI?
Faq.a3: No, we use leading voice technology that makes the conversation feel natural and human. It's like talking to a friendly assistant.
Faq.q4: What if they just forgot their phone?
Faq.a4: This is where our AI triage is unique. The AI assistant calls multiple times and tries to establish contact gently before involving the family, preventing false alarms.
Faq.a5: Absolutely. We only use data to ensure safety and improve the conversation. We never use GPS tracking or cameras.
Faq.q6: Can the AI remember specific needs?
Faq.a6: Yes, our AI is contextual and learns routines to provide better support and more relevant follow-up over time.
Faq.a7: Yes. You can easily pause the service when you have visitors or are away.
